com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.collections

Class ClassMap<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.collections.ClassMap<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - - Value type to map to Class keys

    public class ClassMap<V>
extends java.lang.Object
    A map that obtains the value bound to a given Class. Only if the key specified is an instance of a mapped Class, is the value returned.
